title: The 4 most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin for the appearance of guava in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing guava in a dream and its meaning: Guava is one of the fruits that many love and has many health and healing benefits. Guava fruit is used to prevent cancer and heart disease and also protects people from colds. As for seeing it in a dream, it has many interpretations, which we will explain to you through the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about guava: You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Ibn Sirin confirmed that if the dreamer sees a guava tree in his dream, this vision will be a sign that he will overcome All crises and opens the door to success in the near future. If the dreamer drinks a cup of fresh guava juice in his dream, this vision indicates the end of the period of sorrows and the emergence of happiness and joy. If the dreamer sees fresh guava fruit in his dream, this will be evidence of halal trade. When the dreamer dreams With rotting guava fruits, this dream means that he will become a prey to sleep and bad words will be said about him without his knowledge. If the dreamer buys guava in his dream, this confirms that he is a hasty person and always makes life decisions without thinking about them, but this vision reassures its owner that God will remove his sorrows soon. Jurists pointed out The guava tree in a dream is one of the visions that heralds the end of problems. The symbol of guava in a dream means that the dreamer will be a distinguished and superior person in her life. A dream of guava for a single woman. If an unmarried woman ate a guava in her dream and it did not have seeds, this means that she will be able On receiving a blessing soon. Single women eating delicious guava juice in a dream indicates many good things that will come their way in the very near future. If someone gives an unmarried woman in her dream a plate of guava and she eats from it, then this dream means that many Positive things will happen soon in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about eating guava by Ibn Sirin: If a married woman sees in her dream that she has a bowl of guava in her hands and gives her children some of it and they start eating and they are happy, then this dream indicates that woman’s happiness with her children and husband. And that her life will be full of joy throughout her life, God willing. If a divorced woman eats a guava fruit in a tasteless dream, this vision confirms that her partner will go through difficult circumstances, but these circumstances will not last long. If a single woman sees himself giving a plate of guava to a girl who was not He knows her before, so this vision is evidence of his entry into the golden cage and his marriage in the near future. Guava in a dream If the dreamer sees a green guava in a dream, this dream means that his affairs in this world will be facilitated. If the guava in the dreamer’s color is yellow, then this vision is not good, It portends problems and diseases that will afflict the dreamer. Interpreters said that a yellow guava in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will lose one of his possessions. A white guava in the dreamer’s dream is evidence that God will soon bring contentment and peace to his heart and give him a better life than the one he is currently living.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of bowing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations and interpretations of the appearance of prostration in a dream and the meaning of seeing it. Interpretation of bowing in a dream is one of the dreams that many people search for and which differs from one person to another, and through this article we will learn about many of these cases. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type in an Egyptian dream interpretation site. Seeing lying down. In a dream: If a person sees in a dream that he is worshiping other than God (Glory be to Him), then this vision indicates that the dreamer is in a city different from his country of origin, and there is a problem with that. His face in the near future. If someone sees this previous vision in a dream, this is evidence that in the near future this person will suffer a huge amount of sorrows and worries in addition to quarrels and oppression. As for someone who dreams of the same previous vision, it may be an indication that this person He always tries to achieve some goals, dreams and desires that he desires, but this vision is an indicator that he will not be able to reach them. Objectives.Prostration in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees in a dream that he is worshiping God and that the worship was on the ground or on a mountain or any other place, then this vision indicates that this person will gain great strength and confidence.If one sees the same vision in a dream, it may be This is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a prominent position and a high relationship among those around him, or that one of his children will advance in his life, whether in work or study. Very soon.Interpretation of a dream about kneeling on the ground: If one sees in a dream that he is worshiping God and his worship is on the ground, then this vision shows that the dreamer has a pure heart and has a lot of compassion for everyone around him, in addition to being always vigilant. Consciousness – Realization. If one sees the same vision in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is closer to God and always worships Him because of the situation he is in. The same vision as before when a person dreams of him may be a sign that the dreamer is only with his parents and they are always praying for him. His life will be well and blessed. What does the sign of bowing mean in a dream? As for the interpretation of prostration in a dream for a woman, if the woman sees that the sign of prostration has appeared on her, then this vision indicates that this woman will soon bless God with abundant provision, money, and spoils, in addition to the blessings of God that he will judge. On and around it. The same previous vision, if someone sees it in a dream, is evidence that the person who has this vision is closer to God and always tries to approach Him with different rituals and prayers. What is the interpretation of a dream about kneeling and praying? If a person sees in a dream that he is performing prayer rituals and that he is worshiping God And calls upon God during prayer, this vision indicates that the owner of the vision is always striving to achieve some desires and goals and is constantly calling on God. . To achieve it and help him reach it, the vision is an indication that God will fulfill his ambition. If someone in a dream sees the same vision, it can be evidence that the person who sees the dream is always trying to get closer to God and that he is always trying to pray, fast and fulfill the rituals

title: Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream for a single married woman and a man. The dreamer may be auspicious and earn a legitimate livelihood, and he may indicate victory over enemies and the strength and courage of the dreamer. Indicators in life vary depending on the practical, social or psychological situation. If a person sees him pregnant in a dream, this indicates the birth of a male, and God knows best what is in the wombs. Interpretation of seeing a sword for a man: Seeing a man with a sword on his head is evidence of a high status and a high status among creatures. What if he saw many swords? The vision indicates receiving a promotion through work and then increasing capital. Because breaking a sword is evidence of dismissal or dismissal from work, and being exposed to many crises and disagreements in life. I mean, seeing a broken sword in a dream is about the divorce of a partner or the loss and death of a family member. But if he sees in a dream a fence or a knife on someone, this is evidence of... A partnership in the field of work, trade, or family relationship. Seeing a sword indicates a connection for a short period, and God knows best. For this reason, a metal sword indicates the strength of the dreamer and the joy of courage and generosity. Likewise, if he sees the sword in the sheath, this is evidence of marriage to a beautiful and pious girl. In addition to that Seeing a sword from the beginning is evidence of the dreamer’s wealth. Then it indicates honour, pride and dignity. A wooden sword indicates hypocrisy and lies. Interpretation of a dream about a silver sword in a dream: I see a silver sword indicating lawful means of livelihood and business profits. It is also one of the promising visions of good nutrition and its breadth. So fencing, you She reports bad words to others, and wastes money in vain. Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream for a married woman: A sword shows a married woman a sense of pride and security. Then it shows good nutrition for the offspring. But if she sees her husband giving her a sword in a dream, this is evidence of pregnancy with a man, and God knows best. Buy A married woman’s sword is proof of finding a job or career. Or earning a lot of money. Therefore, if she dreams of telling someone about her sword, this is a sign of excellence and success in her life. A married woman’s sword indicates goodness and truth, as well as justice and victory over enemies. A sword for attending a wedding indicates loss. Anxiety, sadness, and some time, and the truth appears. Dreaming of a sword that was stolen, lost, or dropped. Stealing a sword in a dream indicates being plundered, stolen, lost, and lost. The dreamer will lose one of the most valuable and valuable things. Stealing a sword in a dream is evidence of weakness, a feeling of insecurity, and fear, then separation from those close to him appears. From you. Indicates stealing a sword. In a dream, after hearing sad and unpleasant news for some time, the dreamer’s mental state is bad. Dream of fencing and striking with a sword in a dream. Seeing a sword strike in a dream, this means that the dreamer will reach a high position and honor, or seek the goodness of the Creator. But if he sees in a dream That he was stabbed with a sword, this is evidence that he was stabbed with insulting words. Seeing a threat with a sword and a stabbing, not a stabbing, indicates his intention to speak, to remain silent and not to speak. Interpretation of a duel The dream in a dream indicates a

title: The 20 most famous interpretations of a dream about getting out of prison by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting out of prison: The dream indicates many associations, but it mostly indicates relief and the end of worry and anxiety from the dreamer’s life and relieving him of all the problems he suffered during this period, and we will learn about them in detail below. Interpretation of a dream about getting out of prison: Seeing being released from prison symbolizes The good news that a person will hear soon, God willing. If a person is already imprisoned and sees in a dream that he has been released from prison, this is an indication that he will be released from prison in reality. Seeing him getting out of prison in a dream means getting rid of the crises and problems that plague him. His life. When a person sees in a dream that he has been released from prison and that he is suffering from some illness, this is a sign that he will recover soon, God willing. Seeing a person who has been released from prison is an indication that he will achieve the goals that he has been striving for for a long time. If a person sees In a dream that he is leaving prison to escape and there were a lot of dogs around him, this is a sign that there are enemies around him who want to destroy his life and he must be careful. Hmm. But if a person sees in a dream that he has been released from prison and his appearance is sad, then this is a sign that he does not find a solution to the problems he faces in his life, but if his appearance was beautiful, this is a sign that he will soon be free of worry and anxiety, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about getting out of prison by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a tooth coming out in a person’s dream as a sign of repentance to God and returning to the path of error and not committing transgressions and misdeeds in the previous period. Seeing yourself getting out of prison in a dream symbolizes the end of problems and a difficult time that The dreamer was going through it in the previous period. In the case of a married man, the dream may be a reflection of his subconscious mind and what he feels during this time in his life with his wife. Also, when one dreams of having his tooth extracted while he is dead, this is a sign that after his death he will repent for all the actions he committed. He committed it in the past for which he was angry with God. Seeing the dreamer getting out of prison in a dream indicates that his life conditions have improved for the better and there are solutions to the problems he faces. The dream in general indicates good news and happy events that will surprise the dreamer soon, God willing. When a young man sees in his dream That he fell out of prison, this is a sign that he will soon marry a good girl. Interpretation of a dream about getting out of prison for a single woman: A single girl’s dream of being released from prison indicates that she will achieve many successes in the coming period and that a new stable and happy period will begin. Seeing an unmarried girl In a dream, it symbolizes that she has emerged from old age and that her doors are open to hope that a relative of hers will appear after she lost him to find solutions to the problems she was facing. To dream of an unmarried girl leaving prison means that she will achieve many of the goals that she has been seeking for a long time. The girl leaving prison is evidence that she will leave everything imposed on her and go to do what she loves. Also, a dream about...

title: The most important interpretations of the symbol of the pink dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The symbol of the pink dress in a dream. The dress is one of the clothes that a woman wears and highlights her femininity and beauty. There are many short and long shapes as well as colors, the best of which is pink, and in the interpretations and opinions of great scholars and translators in the world of dreams such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi. The symbol of the pink dress in a dream is bearable by seeing the dress. Pink in a dream has many connotations and signs that can appear in the following cases: A pink dress in a dream indicates happiness, joy, and peace that the dreamer will have in his life. If the dreamer sees that she is wearing a pink dress in a dream and her appearance is beautiful, this symbolizes that she has good morals. And the good reputation that puts her in a high position among people. The symbol of the pink dress in a dream indicates the good luck and happiness that the dreamer will have in his life and the success that will accompany him in all his affairs. Seeing the pink dress in a dream indicates the good condition and cleanliness of the dreamer’s bed and her good reputation, which puts her in a high position. A prominent position among people and makes her a source of trust for everyone around her. The symbol of the pink dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin discussed the interpretation of the symbol of the pink dress in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations that were given regarding it: The symbol of the pink dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates getting rid of worries and sorrows, The dreamer enjoys comfort and tranquility in his life. If the dreamer sees a pink dress in his dream, this symbolizes the fulfillment of his long-awaited dreams and aspirations. The pink dress in the dream indicates the abundance of food and the release of fears that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time. The symbol of the dress in a dream is Al-Osaimi, one of the most prominent scholars who They ate the dress in Al-Osaimi’s dream, so we present some interpretations related to it: The symbol of the dress in Al-Osaimi’s dream indicates the psychological and material stability that the dreamer will enjoy in her life. If a girl sees that she is wearing a torn pink dress in a dream, this symbolizes her lack of commitment to the teachings of her religion and her negligence towards herself. And her Lord, and she must hasten to repent and return to God. Seeing a dress in a dream means that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better and he will enjoy a full and luxurious life. The symbol of the pink dress in a single woman’s dream. Interpretations of the symbol of the pink dress in a dream varied depending on the social status of the dreamer, and the following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl who You see this symbol: Seeing a pink dress in a dream means that she will meet and join the knight of her dreams, and this relationship will culminate in a happy and blessed marriage. If a girl sees a pink dress in a dream, this symbolizes the calm and stable life that she will enjoy in the coming period. Seeing a pink dress in A dream for a single woman indicates her bright future that awaits her and the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. Buying a pink dress in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying a pink dress, this symbolizes her urgency in doing good, getting closer to God and helping others, which makes her endearing to those around her.

title: Interpretation of the letter Ghayn J by Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter Ghain by Imam al-Sadiq. Through this article, we will show you the interpretation of the letter Ghain by Imam al-Sadiq, who is searching for a very large group of people. It should be noted that seeing a gin burning in a dream has many very different symbols associated with it, as this letter is one of the letters of the alphabet in the Arabic language and is related to many other things that many people see in dreams. , like a song, dust, sieve, or crow in a dream. He pointed out that Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing the letter Ghain in a dream has many interpretations, but many of them indicate good and evil, depending on the situation with certainty, and today during this article we will show you all the details, follow us. You may also be interested in: The Project In a dream, Imam Al-Sadiq interprets seeing feces in a dream. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing feces in a dream as follows: Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that seeing feces in a dream portends bad or good, depending on the situation we see in the dream. If one sees feces in a dream, especially all women, then it It symbolizes the end of all the problems you are experiencing and shows health and strength as well as comfort in worldly life.But if these feces appear in public places according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, this indicates that many scandals will occur, and it also indicates that the dreamer will have many problems. If the feces are visible, but smell bad, this indicates the presence of many very difficult problems in the life of the fortuneteller, and also indicates the occurrence of various diseases. Interpretation of the letter Ghain J by Imam Al-Sadiq What is the interpretation of seeing gas in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq? Seeing gas in a dream has several interpretations Different for every dreamer, but Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that seeing it in a dream indicates praiseworthy things in this world. If an unmarried woman sees gas in her dream, it means that she will get married soon. If one sees gas in general in a dream, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s vision , it symbolizes the removal of all problems and worries and a feeling of safety and comfort in this world. If a married woman sees gas in her dream, this indicates stability in marital life. You may also be interested in: Symbols that indicate problems What is the interpretation of seeing dust in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? According to the sayings of Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Bashir, seeing dust in a dream indicates: If any of you sees dust in general in a dream, this indicates a lot of difficult problems that the dreamer is going through and also indicates poverty. Seeing dust also symbolizes a trip in the near future. But there is no benefit from that trip. You may be interested: A remote control in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a crow in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq stated that seeing a crow in dreams can sometimes symbolize evil and at other times it can symbolize good, and all It depends on the situation. If an unmarried girl finds a crow in her dream, this symbolizes marriage to a good person.

title: Seeing black ants in a dream

preview.html: Seeing killing ants in a dream means getting rid of difficulties and problems in the dreamer’s life, and knowing that the dreamer sees a lot of ants in a dream indicates a large number of offspring in his family, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing black ants in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried woman sees in a dream that black ants He walks on her body in the dream, and she is sad. This indicates that she is sick at this time and that she will be sad about this illness for a long time. And the unmarried woman who sees a lot of ants in her house and stares at them for a long time. It indicates the presence of many offspring in the family of this single woman. The dreamer in life and that she will live with him happily. The dreaming unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is looking for black ants to get rid of them. The following is a summary of some of the problems and obstacles that they faced during this period of time. The dreaming single woman looks at the many black ants that fill her house. In the dream. This is an indication that there will be troubles that this dreamer and her family will go through, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing ants on the wall in a dream. Interpretation of seeing black ants in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at black ants in a dream. It appears Here, she has children at this time in her life. She will live with them happily, God willing. A married woman sees in a dream that she is looking at black ants in her bed in a dream. This is an indication that she was born a boy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A married woman sees ants on her husband’s body and kills him. In a dream. It indicates that her husband is ill at this time and that she will help him recover, God willing, during this time. Seeing ants in a dream indicates a married woman who has not given birth before. It announces the date of her approaching pregnancy and the great happiness that she will see, God willing. Interpretation of seeing black ants in a dream. A dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that there are many ants sitting in her house and she cannot get rid of them, it indicates the problems that she will see in her life during this period. The same applies to the divorced woman who saw ants walking on her body in a dream and was very upset by them. It shows her severe illness. At this time in her life, and God knows best. And the divorced woman who is trying to kill ants in a dream and lives far away from them in the dream. This explains the presence of major problems and obstacles and the divorced woman is trying to get rid of them and stay away from them, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that black ants are walking on the wall. Here it is announced Goodness, praiseworthy visions, and good days that this divorced woman will see. Read also: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing black ants in a dream for a man and its meaning. Either he sees black ants walking on the body in a dream for the dreamer. An indication of the hatred, hatred, and envy that afflicts this dreamer. In his life. It causes him major problems this season. And seeing that black ants were abundant on the man’s body, the dream depends on it. It indicates the presence of a disease that will affect this dreamer in his life. Also, seeing ants

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child returning in a dream

preview.html: Heart of a child in a dream and seeing children in a dream are among the favorite and preferred visions in the soul, but the matter is different in the case of the child in the vision as in the case of the dreamer. You may also be interested in meeting the sun in a dream. Therefore, in this article we will discuss seeing a child in a dream vomiting, through... What are called the leading dream interpretation scholars. Seeing a child returning in a dream indicates the presence of difficulties and challenges in the dreamer’s life and he must be careful. Seeing a mother returning her child in a dream indicates magic and envy for the child and the mother should read the Qur’an to the child. Seeing a child wrapping his clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing Sins and transgressions: Heart of a child in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a child returning in a dream for a married woman. We will now discuss the interpretation of the dream of a child returning in a married woman’s dream and explain all its connotations through the words of leading interpretation scholars. Scientists say: If a married woman sees in her dream a small child vomiting and does not know it, this means that she She will be exposed to many problems and crises in the coming period. But if that wife does not give birth and she sees this dream in her dream, it means that she will become pregnant soon, but this child will suffer from some diseases. This dream in a married woman’s dream also indicates that she is going through a difficult period of many Marital disputes and disputes. See also: The project in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the return of a child in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of this dream in an unmarried girl’s dream differs from the interpretation of a married woman or any other person, and we will explain that below. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a small child returns to her clothes This dream indicates that she will repent for the sins and sins that she has committed. It can also indicate that the dream of an unmarried girl in a dream does not have the option of choosing between two things she is facing at this time. Also, the unmarried woman seeing in her dream that a small child returns to her clothes This means that this girl has a strong personality and has the ability to overcome the crises and difficulties she faces. See also: Symbols that indicate problems. Interpretation of a dream about the return of a child in a pregnant woman’s dream. Now we will show you the interpretation of a dream about the return of a child in a pregnant woman’s dream and we will point out its various explanations and interpretations. If A pregnant woman dreamed of her young child returning to her clothes. This dream indicates that she will go through many difficulties and crises during pregnancy. This dream in a pregnant woman’s dream can also indicate that she is thinking a lot about her upcoming fetus and that this is just one of the obsessions of her subconscious mind. See Also: Insulting religion in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child returning in a man’s dream. The matter differs in the interpretation of this dream in a man’s dream from a married woman or an unmarried girl, and we will explain that below. If a man sees in his dream that a small child returns to his clothes and he does not know anything about them, then this dream indicates However, he will face some problems at work. It may also indicate that the dream in a man’s dream indicates that there are those who look at him with envy and that he must seek refuge in God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of a dead person sleeping in bed in a dream according to the most famous interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of the dead person sleeping on the bed in a dream according to the most famous interpretation scholars. The graves contained many of those close to us and whom we had a lot of love and longing for after their departure. The Islamic religion also always called for supplication for the dead and remembering him all the time and time, so that God Almighty may have mercy on him and the flow of forgiveness and forgiveness in their sheets, and from our longing. The big ones have some existing dreams, and from here we will talk about the interpretation of dead people sleeping in bed in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dead people sleeping in my bed. Death leaves pain in the hearts from which a person cannot recover, no matter how many days and years pass, and dreams remain the refuge that one can see. There is someone who went and left his heart writhing in pain and longing, and in the context of talking about it, we will proceed to explain the interpretation of seeing the dead sleeping on my bed as follows: Seeing the dead sleeping on the bed of the living indicates the beautiful state that the deceased will enjoy in the afterlife. It has also been shown that hugging the dead during Sleep is evidence of forgiveness and good deeds that flowed into his records and papers. Dreaming of a deceased person sleeping on a bed in a dream may indicate eternal happiness and comfort that the deceased will enjoy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a divorced woman, one of the most famous scholars of interpretation. Seeing a dead person sleeping on a bed in a dream for a married woman. Death was one of Painful events that no human being can bear. Rather, it is God Almighty who instills patience in hearts, and makes a person able to bear the calamities that befall him. As for talking about them, we will be in this article to clarify the ambiguity around the dream of seeing a dead person asleep in bed. In a married woman’s dream, it is as follows: A married woman’s vision of a sleeping dead person in her dream indicates love and great longing for him. In addition, if a married woman sees that a deceased person is sleeping in her bed, this indicates her happiness in the near future. It is also one of the dreams that indicates the fulfillment of Many desires and aspirations. This indicates that the dream of a married woman who saw her dead father sleeping in her bed is evidence of the end of sorrows and worries. It is also evidence of the great achievements that the married girl will achieve in the near future. See also: Interpretation of a dream on Saturday in a dream and its meaning: seeing a dead father sleeping in A dream for an unmarried woman: The fact that death is one of the difficult cases that, no matter how many years, can be ignored or denied, is a difficult reality from which sadness can penetrate our hearts after the separation of loved ones and relatives, as the father is. From most of them whose separation was a heartache that cannot be healed, and in the context of discussing this, we explain the interpretation of seeing a dead father sleeping on the bed in an unmarried woman’s dream with the following points: Seeing the dead person sleeping on the bed is evidence that she is a sincere girl, and follows her religion and what it calls her to. Also, the dream of a dead person sleeping in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence that she calls for good and is always the one who enjoins good and forbids evil. This is in addition to her noble spirit, which always brings her love for others, happiness and comfort. See also: Interpretation of a dream

title: What is the interpretation of seeing full mercury in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadot website provides you with an interpretation of seeing full mercury in a dream. Red in vision and in the books of major scholars on the interpretation of dreams and visions, as well as in all the details of this dream for men and women. If you are interested in knowing what is the interpretation of seeing only mercury, then you should follow the article Why does Mercury dream of Nabulsi? In the interpretation of a dream about Mercury from Nabulsi’s book, he said that this is an exacerbation of matters and evidence of what did not happen. Also, dreaming of someone giving mercury is one of the visions that indicate dishonesty. And disagreement about dating. Seeing full mercury in a dream and eating it is an unwanted vision that indicates troubles and problems that the dreamer faces. Carrying full mercury in your hand in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s weakness in his religion and his falling into many sins and mistakes. Also, catching Full mercury in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is carried away by his desires, as well as a sign of people's betrayal. Seeing silver mercury in a dream is complete. The interpretation of seeing silver mercury in a dream completely indicates desired actions and hearing good and happy news. Seeing full silver mercury in a dream indicates a change in circumstances And an improvement in circumstances, in addition to kindness and support. Also, seeing silver mercury in a dream is a sign that the young man will marry a beautiful girl. Why dream of red mercury? The interpretation of seeing mercury in a dream indicates a difference in affairs, making mistakes, and exposing the dreamer to the oppression of enemies. Seeing a woman In a dream filled with mercury poisoning is a sign that she will be expelled from the family. Sweating in mercury in a dream is one of the unpleasant dreams that indicate siege, imprisonment, and intrigues. Consuming mercury in a dream indicates trouble and hardship, and the dreamer will enter a wrong period of his life. Dream of white mercuryThe interpretation of Seeing completely white mercury in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has earned a lot of money by deceiving women. Also, seeing white mercury in a dream is a sign of a paralyzed woman and a liar who invents tricks. Seeing white mercury in a dream indicates a woman eating forbidden money or that his wife She has betrayed him. Why do you dream of red mercury? The evidence for this dream is a sign that the dreamer will face some things that make him feel tired and sad. Also, seeing red mercury in a dream and its melting indicates the end of harmful things and the beginning of stability in life. Why does mercury dream of a pregnant woman? Interpretation of seeing mercury In a pregnant woman’s complete dream, it is one of the visions that indicate her reconsideration and fear of pregnancy and childbirth, but her birth will pass safely and securely, God willing. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.
